posts.post_content:
I'd like to sell these as a group, at a discount, or in smaller groups.  
So, while I've given individual prices, I won't be selling individual cards right now, only orders that total $100 or more.  Free shipping at that point.

First come, first served.
"I'll take it" trumps any other negotiations. 

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or post here. No pm's, please, unless necessary.

Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or pay by check.  
Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

Note on scans: As the page turns, the backs are in opposite order.
Cards are in halved sleeves [for facility of inserting/removing them in/out of collector pages], thus the apparent lines/plastic shading on the cards.

Trimmed: All 3 for $58, free delivery

Devore, Sovereign 460, bottom border is suspect to me, $28, 
Barry, Piedmont, looks VG, but,  $20,
Lake, Piedmont, Poor, with paper-loss, $10,

Paskert, Piedmont, with back-stamp, looks VG but trimmed.  No longer for sale, but available for trade.  


Graded: Prices to come.  Meanwhile, let me know what you want and I’ll give you a price.  Scans upon request.

Arellanes, Piedmont, SGC 20, [nice front, has bit of paper-loss on back], $24
